scripts.prod: npm run build --silent && npm run install-g --silent
scripts.build: npm run copy-templates-models && npm run keep-dist-template && npm run compile && npm run bundle && npm run min && npm run remove-temp && npm run end-bld
scripts.dev-build: npx rimraf dist && npm run copy-templates-models && npm run compile && npm run extract-temp && npm run end-dev-bld
scripts.extract-temp: cp -r ./dist/TEMP/ ./dist/ && npm run remove-temp && npm run end-ext-tmp
scripts.remove-temp: npx rimraf dist/TEMP && npm run end-rmv-tmp
scripts.keep-dist-template: npx rimraf dist/{utils,templateAnalyser} && npx rimraf dist/*.* && npm run end-kee-dst-tmp
scripts.copy-templates-models: mkdir -p dist/template && cp -r ./src/template ./dist/ && npm run end-cpy-tmp-mdl
scripts.end-ext-tmp: echo '[\x1b[32m✔\x1b[37m] \x1b[32mTEMP folder has been extracted from its content\x1b[37m'
scripts.end-rmv-tmp: echo '[\x1b[32m✔\x1b[37m] \x1b[32mdist/TEMP folder is deleted from now\x1b[37m'
scripts.end-kee-dst-tmp: echo '[\x1b[32m✔\x1b[37m] \x1b[32memptied the dist folder except the template folder\x1b[37m'
scripts.end-cpy-tmp-mdl: echo '[\x1b[32m✔\x1b[37m] \x1b[32mThe model for the template has been copied successfuly\x1b[37m'
